title: Hire Me?
intro:
I’m in the market for full-time, part-time, or contract work, depending on too many factors to write here.

Portland, OR, USA is my home base. I’m happy to travel (a shit ton), but am not willing to move outside of Portland at this time. Because love.

Email [patrick.lorenzut@gmail.com](mailto:patrick.lorenzut@gmail.com) and let’s kickstart this party!

- Side projects [here](/projects).
- Resume [here](/resume).
- GitHub [here](https://github.com/patricklorenzut).
